COM.ibm.eannounce.abr.util
Class SAPLElem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.ibm.eannounce.abr.util.SAPLElem
Direct Known Subclasses:
SAPLCHQISOElem, SAPLEnterpriseElem, SAPLFixedElem, SAPLGEOAnnElem, SAPLGEOAvailElem, SAPLGEOElem, SAPLGEOFilteredElem, SAPLIdElem, SAPLItemElem, SAPLMessageIDElem, SAPLNLSElem, SAPLNotificationElem
public class SAPLElem
extends java.lang.Object

Base Class used to hold info and structure to be generated for the xml feed for SAPLABRSTATUS abrs If a value is not available in the desired NLSID, then the TAGs should still be generated with an empty data value.

removeCheat

public static java.lang.String removeCheat(java.lang.String xmltoFix)
OIDH can't handle a standard empty XML tag , must have cheat is to always have a value so the document creates the open and close tags then remove the cheat value

Parameters:
xmltoFix - String with xml that needs cheat value removed
Returns:
String with cheat values removed
